Package Comment

Class TextComment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Comment.Comment
      • Comment.TextComment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TextComment
extends Comment
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class which implements a comment a user can make on an Offer, using just some text. It also has a list of answers so that a TextComment can have more TextComments as answers.
    Author:
    Javier Delgado del Cerro, Javier Lopez Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
